013package org.apache.juneau;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
016
017import java.text.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
020
021/**
022 * Subclass of runtime exceptions that take in a message and zero or more arguments.
023 *
024 * <ul class='seealso'>
025
026 * </ul>
027 *
028 * @serial exclude
029 */
030@FluentSetters
031public class BasicRuntimeException extends RuntimeException {
032
033   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
034   // Static
035   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
036
037   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
038
039   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
040   // Instance
041   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
042
043   boolean unmodifiable;
044   String message;
045
046   /**
047    * Constructor.
048    *
049    * @param cause The cause of this exception.
050    * @param message The {@link MessageFormat}-style message.
051    * @param args Optional {@link MessageFormat}-style arguments.
052    */
053   public BasicRuntimeException(Throwable cause, String message, Object...args) {
054      super(format(message, args), cause);
055   }
056
057   /**
058    * Constructor.
059    *
060    * @param message The {@link MessageFormat}-style message.
061    * @param args Optional {@link MessageFormat}-style arguments.
062    */
063   public BasicRuntimeException(String message, Object...args) {
064      super(format(message, args));
065   }
066
067   /**
068    * Constructor.
069    *
070    * @param cause The cause of this exception.
071    */
072   public BasicRuntimeException(Throwable cause) {
073      super(cause);
074   }
075
076   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
077   // Properties
078   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
079
080   /**
081    * Specifies whether this bean should be unmodifiable.
082    * <p>
083    * When enabled, attempting to set any properties on this bean will cause an {@link UnsupportedOperationException}.
084    *
085    * @return This object.
086    */
087   @FluentSetter
088   protected BasicRuntimeException setUnmodifiable() {
089      unmodifiable = true;
090      return this;
091   }
092
093   /**
094    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this bean is unmodifiable.
095    *
096    * @return <jk>true</jk> if this bean is unmodifiable.
097    */
098   public boolean isUnmodifiable() {
099      return unmodifiable;
100   }
101
102   /**
103    * Throws an {@link UnsupportedOperationException} if the unmodifiable flag is set on this bean.
104    */
105   protected final void assertModifiable() {
106      if (unmodifiable)
107         throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Bean is read-only");
108   }
109
110   /**
111    * Same as {@link #getCause()} but searches the throwable chain for an exception of the specified type.
112    *
113    * @param c The throwable type to search for.
114    * @param <T> The throwable type to search for.
115    * @return The exception, or <jk>null</jk> if not found.
116    */
117   public <T extends Throwable> T getCause(Class<T> c) {
118      return ThrowableUtils.getCause(c, this);
119   }
120
121   /**
122    * Sets the detail message on this exception.
123    *
124    * @param message The message.
125    * @param args The message args.
126    * @return This object.
127    */
128   @FluentSetter
129   public BasicRuntimeException setMessage(String message, Object...args) {
130      assertModifiable();
131      this.message = format(message, args);
132      return this;
133   }
134
135   @Override /* Throwable */
136   public String getMessage() {
137      if (message != null)
138         return message;
139      String m = super.getMessage();
140      if (m == null && getCause() != null)
141         m = getCause().getMessage();
142      return m;
143   }
144
145   @Override /* Throwable */
146   public synchronized Throwable fillInStackTrace() {
147      assertModifiable();
148      return super.fillInStackTrace();
149   }
150
151   @Override /* Throwable */
152   public synchronized Throwable initCause(Throwable cause) {
153      assertModifiable();
154      return super.initCause(cause);
155   }
156
157   @Override /* Throwable */
158   public void setStackTrace(StackTraceElement[] stackTrace) {
159      assertModifiable();
160      super.setStackTrace(stackTrace);
161   }
162
163   /**
164    * Returns the caused-by exception if there is one.
165    *
166    * @return The caused-by exception if there is one, or this exception if there isn't.
167    */
168   public Throwable unwrap() {
169      Throwable t = getCause();
170      return t == null ? this : t;
171   }
172
173   // <FluentSetters>
174
175   // </FluentSetters>
176}
